section.title: The object element

list.item: A generic embedded media object (image, video, audio).

section.p: The object element represents a generic embedded media object like images, videos, audio and other types of multimedia files.

item.title: Flow
item.p: When its parent is an inline element or a block element that only allows inline elements its flow is inline, otherwise its flow is block.

section.p: The src attribute must be used to provide the URI (xs:anyURI) of the resource.
The type attribute may be used to provide the mime type of the resource.
The children of the object element must be used to provide an alternative content if the resource provided by src fails to load.
The alternative content must be inline or block in accordance of the flow of its object parent.
